details.description: You need a licence to use sound recordings for on-stage or off-stage effects
details.licence_short_description: Licence to use sound recordings for on-stage or off-stage effects.
details.licence_overview:
To use sound recordings for on-stage or off-stage effects, you are likely to need a licence from Phonographic Performance Limited (PPL). A licence from PRS for Music may also be required.

You may also need a PRS for Music licence - but not a PPL licence - if you are playing live music during a performance.
